name: Bdd Videoannotator
body:
### Why ?
BDD-based tests should improve the way you integrate the stakeholders in the development process. But is a textually story really suitable to describe the handling of the software using the GUI?

You can already set up click tests using automation Frameworks like [Selenium](http://www.seleniumhq.org/) to execute such an acceptance test. But as a result you only get a textual logfile that describes what happened on the front end.

To close this gap BDD Videoannotator can record a screencast that contains the steps specified in the BDD-Feature-Files.

### Usage
BDD Videoannotator is a plugin that can be used for various BDD-Tools. Currently there are two sample projects showing the usage of BDD-Videoannotator:
* [Cucumber JVM in Java](https://github.com/shell88/bdd_videoannotator/tree/master/sampleCucumberJVM)
* [Behat in PHP] (https://github.com/shell88/bdd_videoannotator/tree/master/sampleBehat)

### Support or Contact
To improve BDD Videoannoator please give your feedback by opening issues at the [Github Issue Tracker](https://github.com/shell88/bdd_videoannotator/issues)
